name: Amazon Princess
effect: When this card is put into play, tap each character in play with power 2 or less (even your own)
"The Amazon world is based on truth on a woman's individual strength." - Terreis

name: Amazon Queen
effect: Instead of tapping resources, you may discard 1 of your own characters in play with Amazon in the title in order to play this card.

name: Amazon Trainer
effect: "From birth, every Amazon is taught to use weapons." - Epihny

name: Archer Attack
effect: Discard 4 cards from your opponent's deck.
"Is that any way to treat an old friend?" - Callisto

name: Arm-Wrestling Contest
effect: Draw a card. you may also give 1 of your blocked or blocking
"As good as ever, aren't you, Xena?" - Draco "Better." - Xena

name: Arrows from the Woods
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play with power 4 or less and discard it.

name: Bacchae Horde
effect: This character can't be blocked
"Awake, my Bacchae! It's time to feed!" - Bacchus

name: Bacchae Rite
effect: Play only when attacked. Choose 1 attacking character and discard it. Discard from your own deck a number of cards equal to that character's power.

name: Bacchus
effect: Unique. Once each turn, whenever you're allowed to play an action card, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play with power 2 or less and discard it.

name: Backstabber
effect: When this card is put into play, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play with power 2 or less and discard it.

name: Bone Dryad
effect: When this card is put into play, discard 2 cards from your own deck. This character can't be blocked.
"Well, they're not gonna jump out at us." - Joxer

name: Callisto
effect: Unique. If this character is attacking, when you're allowed to play combat cards, you may instead choose 1 character blocking this one and discard it. This counts as playing your combat card.

name: Callisto Goes Overboard
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's attacking or blocking characters with power 3 of less and discard it. Discard from your opponent's deck a number of cards equal to that character's power.

name: Callisto Strikes
effect: Choose any number of your opponent's characters in play with combined power 4 or less and discard them.
"If you want your chakram, come and take it." - Callisto

name: Callisto's Master Plan
effect: At the end of the turn, count the number of characters (your own and/or your opponent's) discarded from play during combat this turn. Discard twice that many cards from your opponent's deck.

name: Callisto's Revenge
effect: In addition to tapping resources, discard 1 of your own characters in play in order to play this card. Discard 5 cards from your opponent's deck.

name: Callisto's Wrath
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's tapped characters and discard it.
"You don't just kill me and walk away." - Callisto

name: Castle Guard
effect: If this character is attacking after the combat card step, give it -2 power for that turn.
"You were trying to break into the castle. That's a serious offense."

name: Cecrops
effect: Unique. Instead of tapping resources, you may discard 1 of your own characters in play with Fighter in the title in order to play this card. Fearsome (No character with power 3 or less can block this one)

name: Cecrops's Crew
effect: If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, you may replace it by discarding it and drawing a card.
"You are NOT leaving this ship." - Cecrops

name: Centaur Charger
effect: If this character is attacking and unblocked after the combat step, give it -3 power for that turn.
"The Centaurs fought my army to a standstill. That's how good they are." - Xena

name: Centaur Longbow Archers
effect: When this card is pit in play, discard 1 card from your opponent's deck.
"I've fought centaurs. I know what they can do." - Xena

name: Centaur Veteran
effect: If this character is attacking and unblocked after the combat step, give it -3 power for that turn.
"I fought them. I never defeated them." - Xena

name: Chariot Warrior
effect: Fearsome (no character with power 3 or less can block this one)
"Make me proud, son. Make Ares proud." - Cycnus

name: Cortese's Soldiers
effect: When this card is put into play, discard 2 cards from your opponent's deck. You may also choose 1 character in play with Raider in the title (your own or your opponent's) and return it to its player's hand.

name: Devious Warrior
effect: When this card is put into play, discard 1 of your own resources in play.
"Why can't you trust me?" - Atrius

name: Ephiny, Amazon Warrior
effect: Unique. This character can't be blocked by more than 1 character.
"I'll go - but by myself." Ephiny

name: Everybody Sing!
effect: Play only when attacked. Discard each attacking character with power 2 or less.
"Joxer the Mighty! Master of Virility! Every woman wants him! He's so sexy, it's a sin." - Meg's girls

name: Executioner
effect: When this card is put into play, discard 1 of your own resources in play.
"I believe someone here sent for me."

name: Famous Duelist
effect: When this card is put into play, discard 1 card from your own deck.
"It's time to fill the streets with Lycost's blood." - Tius

name: Gabby's Scrolls
effect: Choose up to 2 of your opponent's characters and tap them.
"I love starting a new scroll. It's so clean. So perfectly empty." - Gabrielle

name: Gabrielle
effect: Unique. When this card is put into play, you may put any number of cards with Xena in the title from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Gabrielle Clears the Way
effect: One of your characters in play can't be blocked for this turn. If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, you may replace it by discarding it and drawing a card.

name: Gabrielle's Sacrifice
effect: Play only when attacking with 2 or more characters. Choose 1 attacking character and discard it. Give each other attacking character +2 power for this turn.

name: Greedy Pirates
effect: If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, you may replace it by discarding it and drawing a card.
"I thought you might wash up here." - Basculis

name: Hades
effect: Unique. When this card is put in play, you may put up to 3 character cards from your discard pile into your hand.
"God of the Underworld at your service." - Hades

name: Harpies
effect: When this card is put into play, you may have your opponent choose a card from his or her hand and discard it. Blocker (This character can't attack)

name: Harpy
effect: When this card is put into play, you may have your opponent choose a card from his or her hand and discard it. Blocker (This character can't attack)

name: Hestian Stones
effect: Draw 4 cards, then put 2 of those cards on the bottom of Your deck in any order.
"C'mon seven! Priestess needs a new pair of sandals!" - Meg, as Leah

name: Improvised Escape Tool
effect: Put up to 3 character cards from your discard pile into your hand.
"This is for business, not pleasure. Well, mostly business." - Autolycus

name: Ixion Centaur
effect: Fearsome (No character with power 3 or less can block this one)
"Whoever has the Stone has the power of Ixion's wicked creation." - Gabrielle

name: Jewel of Demeter
effect: Untap all your resources
"I'm the one who risked my butt to get it." - Thersites

name: Joxer is Prepared
effect: Draw a card. You may also untap 1 of your attacking, unblocked characters at the beginning of your opponent's next turn.

name: Joxer the Mighty
effect: Unique. When this card is put into play, discard 1 card from your own deck. At the beginning of each of your turns, if this card is in your discard pile, put it into play without tapping resources.

name: King Sisyphus
effect: Unique. While this character is in play, your opponent can't untap more than 1 character at the beginning of his or her turn.

name: Many Skills
effect: Put up to 2 combat cards from your discard pile into your hand.
"You embroider?"

name: Massacre
effect: Discard each character in play with power 3 or less (even your own)
"I want the dead . . . I'm gonna put them to work." - Xena

name: Meeting of the Warlords
effect: Return each character and resource in play (even your own) to its player's hand.
"I wasn't content to let the warlords have all the fun, so I laid a few traps." - Sisyphus

name: Mounted Warrior
effect: Fearsome (No character with power 3 or less can block this one)
"Run to your master, puppy."

name: Promethean Bird
effect: This Character can't be blocked. Slow (This character can't attack the turn it comes into Play)
"What was that?" - Gabrielle "The scream of Prometheus." - Xena

name: Ready for a Fight
effect: Give 1 of your attacking or blocking characters +3 power for this turn.
"We meet now." - Xena

name: Roman Centurion
effect: "Here. I hope you like gruel. I know it's not what Roman elite are used to eating. . . " - Gabrielle

name: Sintare's Tricks
effect: Draw a card. You may also choose 1 of your opponent's attacking or blocking characters with power 3 or less and discard it.

name: Sintares
effect: Unique. When this card is put into play, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play with power 4 or less and discard it.

name: Siren's Call
effect: Draw a card. You may also choose 1 attacking character (your own or your opponent's) and return it to its player's hand.

name: Solstice Spirit
effect: Slow (This character can't attack the turn it is put into Play)
"I was speaking metaphorically...We shadows from the past Tend to do that." - Gabrielle, as Melana

name: Song of Orpheus
effect: Play only when attacked. When this combat resolves, attacking, unblocked characters don't discard cards from your deck.

name: Talmadeus's Raiders
effect: When this card is pit into play, discard 2 cards from your opponent's deck. You may also choose 1 character in play with Soldier in the title (your own or your opponent's) and return it to its player's hand.

name: Total Eclipse
effect: Discard all resources in play (even your own).
"Darkness." - Caswallawn

name: Transformed Bacchae
effect: This character can't be blocked
"It's said that Bacchae women take many forms, sometimes Roaming the forests as wolves." - Gabrielle

name: Trapped in Tartarus
effect: Your opponent can't untap any characters at the beginning of his or her next turn.
"Same old torture every day." - Callisto

name: Treachery
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's resources in play and discard it and/or choose 1 of your opponent's characters in pay with power 4 or less and discard it.

name: Underworld Escapee
effect: When this card is put into play, you may put up to 3 action cards from your discard pile into your hand.
"It's great to be wicked and dead." - Toxeus

name: Untrained Amazon
effect: Slow (This character can't attack the turn it is put into play)
"She not bad, actually. A little rough." - Eponin

name: Velasca
effect: Unique. Whenever you're allowed to play an action card, you may discard 1 card from your own hand in order to choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play and discard it.

name: Velasca Attacks
effect: Discard 1 card at random from your opponent's hand. If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, you may replace it by discarding it and drawing a card.

name: Velasca's Wrath
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's characters in play and discard it
"You can't hide from a god!" - Velasca

name: War Chariots
effect: If this character is attacking after the combat card step, give each of your other attacking characters +1 power for that turn.
"Take cover!"

name: Xena Puts on the Pinch
effect: Play only when attacking. Give 1 attacking character +2 power for this turn. If this card is in your hand at the end of the turn, you may replace it by discarding it and drawing a card.

name: Xena's Discovery
effect: Put up to 2 resource cards from your discard pile into your hand.
"Looking for this? I took it off a peddler . . . being chased by barbarians. Chased by naked Gabrielles." - Xena

name: Xena's Graveyard Search
effect: Put any card from your discard pile into your hand.
"Be quiet and don't step on a grave." - Xena

name: Xena, Warrior Princess
effect: Unique. If this character attacks, you may put 1 card with Gabrielle in the title from your discard pile into your hand.
"Sometimes the best man for the job is a woman." - Ares

name: YII-YII-YII-YII-YII-YII-YII!
effect: Play only when attacking. Give 1 of your attacking characters +3 power for this turn for each character blocking it.
"She's a VERY physical person." - Gabrielle

name: Young Centaur
effect: If this character is attacking and unblocked after the combat card step, give it -3 for that turn.
"The young bucks think it's a test of manhood to go hunting on Amazon lands." - Callisto

name: Young Priest
effect: "Let's find someplace to rest." - Phyleus
